V-sync ? I'm a newbie yes ...

Google it. It's an option that can be turned on in Windows or in Linux. It's short for vertical sync. Basically it caps your framerate out at exactly your monitor's refresh rate. It prevents screen tearing
But if you are capped at exactly 60 FPS then it's definitely V-sync. Though V-sync isn't necessarily bad. Depending on what game I'm playing on my desktop I turn it on
I find it really weird that no one in #xorg would suggest vsync as what's holding your FPS back...
